div.script: (function(){var mainNav=document.getElementById("J-main-nav");if(mainNav){proc(mainNav)}mainNav=document.getElementById("J-main-nav-r");if(mainNav){proc(mainNav)}function proc(mainNav){var navItems=mainNav.getElementsByTagName("li");var currentNavItem;var hasClass=function(element,className){var classNames=element.className.split(/\s+/);for(var i=0;i<classNames.length;i++){if(className===classNames[i]){return true}}return false};for(var i=0,len=navItems.length;i<len;i++){var nav=navItems[i];if(hasClass(nav,"current")){currentNavItem=nav}}if(!currentNavItem){return}var currentNavLink=currentNavItem.getElementsByTagName("a")[0];if(!hasClass(currentNavLink,"aa-nav-toggle")){return}currentNavItem.className+=" active";var targetSubNavId=currentNavLink.href.split("#")[1];var targetSubNav=document.getElementById(targetSubNavId);if(!targetSubNav){return}var inner=targetSubNav.getElementsByTagName("div")[0];var wrapper=targetSubNav.parentElement.parentElement;targetSubNav.className+=" aa-nav-in";targetSubNav.style.display="block";inner.style.top="0";inner.style.display="block";wrapper.style.minHeight=inner.offsetHeight+"px"}})();

label.data-helptip: A consistent name for grouping an app's different versions within and across stores. The data is maintained by and is property of App Annie.
A collection of apps sharing the same intellectual property, similar to movie franchise. The data is maintained by and is property of App Annie.

div.div: Drag a column header here and drop it to group by that column.

div.strong: Not Logging Sleep Correctly, Voice Cues Need Fixed

div.div: The latest version does a poor job of determining when I am asleep. The previous version was usually spot-on. This one misses about two hours consistently. The voice cues played during an activity sound like a drunk woman trying to slur her way through the announcement. There used to be options to alter the voice, but now they're gone.

So I gave UP on jawbone. Had 2 of 4 jawbone UP24 die within the first 6 months. Got my UP2 replacement and it dies within 6 months. Adios jawbone. I'm hoping to get some mileage out of the Fitbit chargeHR and I only hope that Fitbit actually builds its band for people who do thinks that require some durability on the device like SWEAT and Shake and bounce. You know those exercise things that aren't yoga. I will say that Jawbone has sharper app with more pop but I spend GOOD MONEY for something that works and last for what it's sold as.
Used the app with standard Fitbit and it didn't give near the info it does with the HR. Seems to interface well.

div.strong: Love my Fitbit and the app so far

div.div: I've only had this two days but so far no issues. I love having it sync with my phone and knowing how I sleep. I also really like the fact that it seems to have nearly every food I eat.
Love it so far! Works much better than the vivofit and garmin app
I think this is the nicest thing since sliced bread. It has everything you could think of. Thanks fit bit

div.strong: Used to love this app...not anymore!

div.div: This used to be a great app. Worked the first time, every time. Not anymore. I'm lucky if it works by the tenth try. It takes over 15 minutes just to get it to sync my data. Several times I've actually had to delete it and reinstall just to see my information. I'm almost done with Fitbit!
Never knew how much I walked till I started using this app! Love the weekly report too!!!

div.script: aaTrack=function(){var e={},f=[],k=0,h=function(){if(arguments[0]){var a=arguments[0],g=[].slice.call(arguments,1);500>k?(f.push([a,g]),k++):(f.shift(),f.push([a,g]));if(e[a])for(var a=e[a],b=a.length,c=0;c<b;c++)a[c].apply(null,g)}};h.register=function(a,g){a:if("object"==typeof a)for(var b in a){var c=a[b];if(e[b])for(var d=e[b],k=d.length,l=0;l<k;l++){if(d[l]==c)break a}else e[b]=[];e[b].push(c)}if(g)for(var h in a)for(b=a[h],c=f.length,d=0;d<c;d++)f[d][0]==h&&b.apply(null,f[d][1])};return h}();
